job_title: Backend Software Engineer - Commerce Cloud (MTS/Mid Level)
job_description:
• Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Deliver on full life cycle software components for our mission critical, enterprise SaaS web applicationsSupport our commitment to continuous integration, unit tests, and functional automationLead the team in definition of sub-component requirements and accurately forecast project effortProvide attention to detail and a commitment to delivery of high-quality, stable deliverablesWork seamlessly as part of a multi-site, multi-cultural, development and testing teamContinually evangelize Scrum and an Agile development processesBe self-motivated.
• Driven to achieve and exceed committed milestonesDisplay strong collaboration skills, including the ability to mentor and be mentoredDesire to work in a growing, fast-paced environment of innovation Strong backend development experience using Java, Golang, and/or Python2+ years of software development experiencePrior experience deploying production code to cloud technologies such as AWS, GCP or AzureProduction experience deploying and operating applications on KubernetesExperience with CI/CD (Spinnaker, Jenkins, ArgoCD)Prior experience developing API's or REST servicesExperience w/ build tools (Helm, Terraform, Maven, Gradle)Core database(SQL/NOSQL) skills including ability to execute and debug complex queries Experience developing SaaS applicationsFamiliarity with Scrum in an Agile Development environmentBS or MS degree in Computer science or equivalentTeam meets 1 day a week in office (Tuesdays) Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences Past Experience designing and implementing observability solutions for distributed systemsExperience troubleshooting full service stack, end-to-end ownershipPrior experience working with Spring Framework University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager.
